cards.name: Dreramor
cards.description: Dreramor is a mysterious pokemon, shrouded in dark armor. It is rarely seen, unless one is brave enough to explore its crypt-like habitats. It spends its time honing its formidable skills, and its swift and precise strikes are sure to catch the eye of any potential challengers. Its Mystery Slash and Nudge abilities make it a powerful opponent. Dreramor is a true force to be reckoned with.
cards.image_prompt: Dreramor::0 a special psychic-type pokemon::1.8, wearing dark armor, in a crypt environment, dreamy background, anime sketch --niji --ar 3:2
